        Description copied from interface: GameFont
        Draws text to the Graphics context using this font
        Specified by:
        draw in interface GameFont
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics context
        str - The text to render
        x - The x coordinate to draw at
        y - The y coordinate to draw at
        targetWidth - The target width to render with
        horizontalAlignment - The horizontal alignment within the targetWidth. See Align
        wrap - True if text should wrap if exceeding targetWidth, false if it should clip
